title: PM Modi Wishes Israeli Counterpart Netanyahu On Jewish New Year
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has extended wishes to his Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu, people of Israel and Jewish community across the world on the occassion of Rosh Hashanah.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has extended wishes to his Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu, people of Israel and Jewish community across the world on the occassion of Rosh Hashanah.

title: Exclusive: What's Next For Israel After Iran Missile Attack? Envoy Explains
content: Iran's attack on Israel wasn't just a barrage of missiles, it was a barrage of 181 ballistic missiles, each having a warhead payload of between 700-1,000 kilograms. It is unprecedented, Israel's Ambassador told NDTV.
summary: Iran's attack on Israel wasn't just a barrage of missiles, it was a barrage of 181 ballistic missiles, each having a warhead payload of between 700-1,000 kilograms. It is unprecedented, Israel's Ambassador told NDTV.

content: Israeli officials reported that the brave woman shielded her child from harm, giving her life to protect her infant.

title: Fugitive Religious Preacher Zakir Naik Meets Pak PM Shehbaz Sharif
content: Wanted for alleged money laundering charges, controversial Islamic preacher Zakir Naik met Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday.
summary: Wanted for alleged money laundering charges, controversial Islamic preacher Zakir Naik met Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday.

title: Japan Airport Shut After World War II Bomb Explodes Near Runway
content: According to Japan's Transport Ministry, a bomb disposal team confirmed the explosion was caused by an American bomb buried beneath the surface, dating back to a wartime air raid.
summary: According to Japan's Transport Ministry, a bomb disposal team confirmed the explosion was caused by an American bomb buried beneath the surface, dating back to a wartime air raid.

title: 5-Year-Old Boy In US Goes Into Cardiac Arrest While On Disney World Ride

title: Explained: Israel's Tiered Missile Defence Systems vs Iranian Arsenal

title: A Brief History Of Israel, Palestine - Understanding A Decades-Old Conflict
content: Israel and Hamas have been waging war since gunmen from the Palestinian militant group in the Gaza Strip stormed into southern Israel on Oct. 7, killing 1,200 people and capturing 253 hostages, by Israeli tallies.

title: 8 Israeli Soldiers Killed In Action In South Lebanon Offensive: Army
content: The Israeli military said eight soldiers were killed in combat operations in Lebanon on Wednesday, marking the first losses since its forces crossed the border to target Hezbollah.

title: NASA Detects Carbon Dioxide On Surface Of Pluto's Largest Moon Charon

title: As Israel-Iran Conflict Escalates, India Inc Braces For Trade Disruption

title: Rescuers Save 4 Stranded Killer Whales In Russia's Kamchatka: Report
content: A group of Russian rescuers and volunteers have saved four killer whales stranded for hours off the Kamchatka Peninsula in Russia's far east after leading them to deeper waters, the SHOT Telegram channel reported on Wednesday.
summary: A group of Russian rescuers and volunteers have saved four killer whales stranded for hours off the Kamchatka Peninsula in Russia's far east after leading them to deeper waters, the SHOT Telegram channel reported on Wednesday.

title: Matthew Perry Death Case: Accused Doctor Expected To Plead Guilty
content: One of two California doctors who were among the five people charged in the overdose death of "Friends" star Matthew Perry is expected to plead guilty on Wednesday to a charge of illegally distributing the drug ketamine.
summary: One of two California doctors who were among the five people charged in the overdose death of "Friends" star Matthew Perry is expected to plead guilty on Wednesday to a charge of illegally distributing the drug ketamine.

title: "Stain On UN":  Israel Bars Entry Of Secretary General Antonio Guterres
content: Israel has declared UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres as persona non grata and barred him from entering the country following his failure to "unequivocally condemn" Iran's massive missile attack on Israel.
summary: Israel has declared UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres as persona non grata and barred him from entering the country following his failure to "unequivocally condemn" Iran's massive missile attack on Israel.

title: US Man Tries To Kill Terminally Ill Wife To "Ease Her Suffering"
